title: Object brutally hurt in building next to the highway
content: # Object brutally hurt in building 200 meters west of Crazy Creek Falls/n Today, in the morning, an object called Circly got thrown in a white room. He was then hurt by [a certain person on Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/user/Fun-Committee-7104/)/n Authorities found him bleeding out with his arm ripped off in a white building near Crazy Creek Falls. The suspect had fleed far away. If you have any information about the suspect, please contact us at arthur.greghi2105@gmail.com./n The suspect is a Panama hat, he is 6 feet tall. We have no more information./n The weapon of the crime, a **force manipulator** and a **knife** were used to cut him and rip off his arm./n Here, our journalist, Compass, asked Dementy:/n Compass: Dementy what do you think of this ridiculous case?! Dementy said; This is *so* unacceptable! I thought **our** town was peaceful, and not violent! We really have to get a hold on these *fucking* criminals, or else our whole town will get destroyed by them!/n That's all for today, and have a good afternoon.
